name: Cybersport 2
description:
- The player is given the opportunity to assemble a team of professional players;
- 10 teams of TIR1 level, 20 teams of TIR2, TIR3 level, 55 professional cs:go players, 5 best coaches, managers and psychologists;
- New gameplay mechanics where the player controls their squad right on the cs:go map;
- Implemented online, LAN and Major tournaments;
- Improve your PC with new devices and the chance to win will increase significantly;
- It is possible to make transfers of players, view demos of opponents, play praks and much more.
